sourceDesc.p: This is the feature-file for the 2nd person singular feminine bound pronoun after a vowel.

revisionDesc.change: For EGY-___ there are no values found
updating references to Zotero IDs via update-bibl-refs.xsl

wib:featureValueObservation.note: very old speakers (70+) show -č, old speakers (60-70) show variation between -č and -ki, being the latter much more frequent
very old speakers (70+) show -č, old speakers (60-70) show variation between -č and -ki, being the latter much more frequent
The other bound pronouns attested after a consonant were not attested after a vowel
after -v there is gender distinction in contrast to after -C
after -v there is gender distinction in contrast to after -C
after -v there is gender distinction in contrast to after -C
